chapter.title: Nessie Language
chapter.para: This chapter contains the specification of the Nessie language. Nessie is intended to be an educational subset of the nesC Programming language.

Ideally any Nessie program would compile as a nesC program allowing the normal nesC compiler to be used as a tool during the development and testing of Nessie code. In practice this ideal might not be followed 100% in the specification below. However, areas where Nessie is incompatible with nesC should be minimized and ultimately removed.
